description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; figure dressed in black in lower right corner kneels with elbow resting on their extended knee; another figure in a long black garment positioned above and to the left of the kneeling figure extends their hands toward the outstretched arms of the kneeling figure
portfolio: From Plate 4 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Fourth Scene, Plate 4 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
